scripts.stack:start: mkdir -p data/{ingestor,consolidator,minio} && docker stack deploy --compose-file docker-compose.yml log-manager
scripts.stack:restart: docker service rm log-manager_consolidator && docker service rm log-manager_ingestor && docker service rm log-manager_proxy && docker service rm log-manager_minio && npm run stack:start
scripts.test:start: npm run logs-generator:start && npm run consolidator:start
scripts.test:stop: npm run logs-generator:stop && npm run consolidator:stop
